xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 2 Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika » 2.4 Hetusahetukaduka, Kusalattika » 2.4.2 Akusalapada » 2.4.2.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika
Hetusahetukaduka, Kusalattika
Akusalapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
61.
1387Hetu ceva sahetuko ca akusalo dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
62.
1388Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava…pe…  noavigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1389Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1390Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1391(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
<< Hetuup2.4.3 Abyākatapada >>
